```{r setup}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggplot2)
options(knitr.table.format = "latex")
opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

# Section 1
Here is a table

```{r}
kable(mtcars[1:5, 1:5], booktabs = T, caption = "a table") %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = "HOLD_position")
```
